controller.songplayer

Class MidiSongPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.songplayer.MidiSongPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player, SongInfosManager, SongPlayer

    public class MidiSongPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SongPlayer
    A midi song player take a midi track and play them this class exhibits method for managing the reproduction (play, stop, pause...) and the infos of a midi track see also controller.songplayer
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini
